channel.title: European Life Style on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: Photos
item.description: Prague City …… With Scientific Giants With Victor Robert Ambros (Middle), During Professor Victor gave a talk at Charles University, at Prague, Czech Republic, 2025 With Zhijian (James) Chen (Right), During Professor James was awarded the Paul Ehrlich and Ludwig Darmstaedter Prize for 2025, at Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 04/2025 Zhijian (James) Chen is the first one who discovered the DNA sensor-cGAS and is laureate of the Breakthrough Prize in Life Sciences (2019) and the Lasker Award (2024).
